name: freescout
tagline: A self-hosted helpdesk and shared inbox for managing customer support
description: Freescout is a self-hosted helpdesk and shared inbox system designed as an alternative to HelpScout. It supports email integration, collision detection, canned replies, and team workflows through a powerful web UI.

features.title: Help Desk System
features.description: Manage customer support conversations in a shared inbox

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Receive and send support messages via email

features.title: Ticket Management
features.description: Organize conversations with statuses and assignments

features.title: Multi-User Support
features.description: Allow multiple agents to collaborate on tickets

features.title: Knowledge Base
features.description: Publish help articles for common questions

features.title: Web-Based Interface
features.description: Access support tools through a browser
